医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
赋权增强复原力：耻辱对糖尿病患者生活质量的作用一项中国研究揭示了赋权如何通过减轻耻辱感来影响糖尿病患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Empowerment-boosts-resilience-Stigmas-role-in-diabetes-病人-quality-of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Empowerment-boosts-resilience-Stigmas-role-in-diabetes-病人-quality-of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff45537-a247-459a-abf5-ed14d1547e0e Mon, 23 Oct 2023 20:50:00 -0400 Empowerment boosts resilience: Stigma's role in diabetes patients' quality of life
百万之心模型在不增加医疗保险费用的情况下降低了心脏病和中风的风险“百万红心”支付模式激励医疗保健组织降低医疗保险受益人的心血管风险，五年来新发心肌梗塞和中风的发病率小幅但显着减少。该模型并未导致医疗保险支出显着增加，这表明这是一种具有成本效益的改善心血管健康的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Million-Hearts-model-cuts-heart-attack-and-中风-risk-without-hiking-Medicare-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Million-Hearts-model-cuts-heart-attack-and-中风-risk-without-hiking-Medicare-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fff90006-8996-4a7b-9ba0-9f885f43f9a4 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 20:35:00 -0400 Million Hearts model cuts heart attack and stroke risk without hiking Medicare costs
COVID-19 会增加患阿尔茨海默病的风险该研究探讨了 COVID-19 和阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 之间相互关联的风险，强调了 SARS-CoV-2 如何通过神经炎症和神经变性加重 AD 病理。它引起了人们对 COVID-19 的长期认知影响的严重担忧，尤其是那些已经面临 AD 风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/COVID-19-increases-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/COVID-19-increases-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a84f8281-3815-405c-86ed-e83d9ba22e80 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 20:21:00 -0400 COVID-19 increases Alzheimer's risk
封锁忧郁：研究揭示了 COVID-19 对英国心理健康的严重影响研究论文评估了第一波 COVID-19 对英国居民心理健康的影响，揭示了心理困扰的加剧，尤其是在年轻人、女性和少数群体中。研究发现，经济压力、孤独感和家庭密度等因素对大流行期间心理健康下降的严重程度有显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Lockdown-blues-Study-reveals-stark-impact-of-COVID-19-on-mental-health-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Lockdown-blues-Study-reveals-stark-impact-of-COVID-19-on-mental-health-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faff278a-3bd5-47de-8704-b99298fe8587 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 20:11:00 -0400 Lockdown blues: Study reveals stark impact of COVID-19 on mental health in the UK
按小睡按钮真的是一个坏主意吗？研究揭示了早晨闹钟对睡眠和认知的影响这项综合研究深入研究了使用间歇性早晨闹钟或“小睡”的普遍习惯，探讨了其对睡眠质量、情绪、皮质醇水平和认知表现的预测因素和后果。研究结果表明，虽然打瞌睡不会显着影响情绪或睡眠结构，但它可能会减少睡眠惯性并略微增强醒来时的认知能力，从而为这种常见行为的利弊提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Is-hitting-the-snooze-button-really-a-bad-idea-Study-sheds-light-on-the-impact-of-morning-睡眠和认知警报.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Is-hitting-the-snooze-button-really-a-bad-idea-Study-sheds-light-on-the-impact-of-morning-睡眠和认知警报.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99dc540c-ada9-42e1-990c-396970493e5d Mon, 23 Oct 2023 19:57:00 -0400 Is hitting the snooze button really a bad idea? Study sheds light on the impact of morning alarms on sleep and cognition
关于肥胖为何使人面临严重流感风险的新见解肥胖人群中严重流感病例的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/New-insights-into-why-obesity-puts-individuals-at-risk-for-severe-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/New-insights-into-why-obesity-puts-individuals-at-risk-for-severe-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b236b67e-c4e2-40d7-9a58-0f4d8f811b92 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 10:10:00 -0400 New insights into why obesity puts individuals at risk for severe influenza
突破性研究揭示了治疗帕金森病最有效的辅助药物各种抗帕金森病药物的功效、耐受性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Groundwriting-study-reveals-most- effective-adjunctive-drug-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Groundwriting-study-reveals-most- effective-adjunctive-drug-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f209ec-0d98-486f-ae2a-7132c9e61ba4 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Groundbreaking study reveals most effective adjunctive drug for Parkinson's disease
FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe 将在 ESCR-ESTI 2023 上举办开放式 MRI 心脏成像研讨会FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe 很高兴在即将召开的 ESCR-ESTI 大会上举办讨论心脏开放 MRI 的教育会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/FUJIFILM-Healthcare-Europe-to-host-open-MRI-for-cardiac-imaging-symposium-at-ESCR-ESTI-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/FUJIFILM-Healthcare-Europe-to-host-open-MRI-for-cardiac-imaging-symposium-at-ESCR-ESTI-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47186af8-d173-4f7e-a052-4e1b6052da9e Mon, 23 Oct 2023 09:41:00 -0400 FUJIFILM Healthcare Europe to host open MRI for cardiac imaging symposium at ESCR-ESTI 2023
新研究揭示了蛋白质来源对健康、环境和经济的影响基于蛋白质来源的各种饮食的可持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/New-study-reveals-the-impact-of- Protein-sources-on-health-environment-and-economy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/New-study-reveals-the-impact-of- Protein-sources-on-health-environment-and-economy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c40c56e8-3bf3-4c30-a254-7af8f0711c2a Mon, 23 Oct 2023 09:20:00 -0400 New study reveals the impact of protein sources on health, environment, and economy
Optibrium 推出基于云的 StarDrop 药物发现平台Optibrium 宣布其药物发现平台 StarDrop。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Optibrium-introduces-cloud-based-version-of-StarDrop-drug-discovery-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Optibrium-introduces-cloud-based-version-of-StarDrop-drug-discovery-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a26b7e75-98ad-4b1d-b8c6-048cb561d5b8 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 08:53:00 -0400 Optibrium introduces cloud-based version of StarDrop drug discovery platform
